title: We need an alternate path to Mastery 6-7 without blue essence
body:
At the moment, I only have 1000 blue essence worth of champion shards. That is only enough to take two champions to 6 or one champion to 7. I have nine level 6 mastery tokens: 3 pairs and 3 singles. So unfortunately, I cannot bring 3 champions up to 6. 

Yes, I know I can get random champion shards for IP, but I am saving IP for buying champions I don't own.

I propose a new system:

To get Level 6 on a champion requires one of the following:
2 Level 6 tokens and the champion permanent
2 Level 6 tokens and the champion shard
2 Level 6 tokens and 500 blue essence
4 Level 6 tokens

To get Level 6 on a champion requires one of the following:
3 Level 7 tokens and the champion permanent
3 Level 7 tokens and the champion shard
3 Level 7 tokens and 500 blue essence
4 Level 7 tokens

That way, those of us who are IP or blue essence poor can still level up our champions. It will just take a bit longer.

On an unrelated note, I think it would be a bit nicer if instead of Level 6 tokens and Level 7 tokens, it was just S-, S or S+ tokens. Then you could save your S and S+ tokens earned at level 5 for getting level 7.

replies.body: I fucking love the fact that I can finally spend my IP again on something. I've had 200k IP just chilling for the longest time.
I don't mind the system. A week or so of playing and I get around 7k ip. So, a weeks wait to get a champ isn't bad for me. It's only semi-annoying if you're new
M6 and 7 where made for the sole purpose of spending blue essence by ppl that got already the full champ roster
